definitions.definition: to limit the amount of something that can be done or the ability or power of someone to do something:
examples: The company was hamstrung by traditional but inefficient ways of conducting business.

definitions.definition: any of five tendons (= pieces of tissue connecting muscles to bones) at the back of the knee:
examples: He pulled (= injured) a hamstring while playing football.

definitions.definition: one of the three large muscles at the back of the thigh:
